meanings.definition: A person who wins a victory.
meanings.sent1: The victors of the race celebrated with joy.
meanings.sent2: The team of victors lifted the trophy in triumph.
meanings.sent3: The young victors danced happily after their win.
meanings.sent4: In the end, the victors emerged victorious and proud.
meanings.sent5: The image of the victors standing on the podium will forever be remembered.

meanings.sent1: We cheered for the victors as they crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The crowd erupted in cheers for the victorious victors.
meanings.sent3: The group of victors posed for a photo together.
meanings.sent4: The victors' smiles shone brighter than the sun.
meanings.sent5: The victors' determination was evident in their eyes.
